div.p: Flag_of_Saudi_Arabia.svg‎ (SVG file, nominally 750 × 500 pixels, file size: 40 KB)

This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

div.p: Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time.

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 18:58, 8 October 2010

td.span: (Color changed to CMYK: 100-0-50-50 according to Flags of the World. Source: http://www.crwflags.com/fotw/flags/sa.html)
